name: SHMediaLibrary
desc: An object that represents the user’s Shazam library.

items.name: class var `default`: SHMediaLibrary
items.desc: An instance of the user’s default Shazam library.

items.name: func add([SHMediaItem], completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Adds an array of songs to the user’s Shazam library.
